name: Detective Fatima and the Bruce High Quality Foundation
name_original: Detective Fatima and the Bruce High Quality Foundation
description:
Detective Fatima and the Bruce High Quality Foundation

 Detective Fatima and her robo-assistant , 0229938 attempt to solve the mystery of the Bruce High Quality Foundation.

~

What's the actual mystery?
Who is this Detective Fatima?
How come it's all set in the 80s/90s?
No really, what is it about the 80s/90s?
What exactly is the Bruce High Quality Foundation?
Does the chill music have anything yo do with anything?
Who is robo-assistant 0229938 exactly and why is he always floating?

~

6 different endings
music by mensa group international
dozens of unique NPCs
a handful of original locales to explore ...and more!!!
guest strars: lil' onion detective & detective gumball

~

A Bitsy game made for No Shit Sherlock Jam!
follower.js by Sean S. LeBlanc

~

NB: Refresh game after reaching ending (or else 0229938 will no longer follow Fatima on subsequent playthru).
